item.title: Презентація книжки “Голодомор" | Holodomor Book Launch: Melbourne and Sydney
item.description: SYDNEY _** __**__**Презентація книжки “Голодомор “ **__**Л.Мельничук, Перт**_**____** _Крайовий Комітет _Союзу Українських Організацій Австралії (СУОА) та Комітет НПВ з підготовки і проведення _заходів _у 85-ті роковини Голодомору 1932-33 рр , Комітет НПВ та Об’єднання Українських Громад Нової Південної Валії (ОУГ НПВ) запрошують____ на авторську презентацію книжки “ Голодомор”____ д-ра Лесі Мельничук з Перту.****______ __ Презентація відбудеться у Сіднеї,____ в суботу 23-го березня 2019 р.,____ в Домі Молоді – John Street, Lidcombe.

item.title: Invictus Games Sydney Team Ukraine: Day One to Four Summary
item.description:
Wondering how Team Ukraine is doing? Catch up on all the Invictus Games events here, from the minute they arrived in Australia to the latest competition results. 18th OCTOBER, DAY ONE: ARRIVAL Team Ukraine arrived early Thursday to a vibrant crowd at Sydney Airport. Zahrava Dance Ensemble performed, also giving a traditional welcome with bread and salt.
**DAY TWO: MEETING WITH LUKE FOLEY MP **Members of the team were welcomed at NSW Parliament by Luke Foley MP.

item.title: Luke Foley raises Sentsov plight and Team Ukraine in NSW Parliament
item.description: On the 23rd of October 2018, Luke Foley MP, tabled a Private Members Statement, which raised the matter of Oleg Sentsov and welcomed Team Ukraine to Australia for the Invictus Games. On the matter of Sentsov, Mr Foley stated: “I add my voice to the many thousands of voices around the world calling for the immediate release of Oleg Sentsov from his frozen Russian prison. In recent months many Australians of Ukrainian background from my electorate of Auburn and beyond have raised with me the plight of Oleg Sentsov.

item.title: Join the Invictus Flag Presentation in Sydney!
item.description: The Invictus Games is coming to Sydney in October this year. As part of festivities leading up to October, an Invictus Games Flag will be presented to the Ukrainian Community by Luke Foley MP. You can be apart of the Flag Presentation, it is happening this Saturday, August 25th in Sydney, 1.30pm at the Independence Festival. More details about the festival can be found here. Following the presentation, there will be a community photo with Luke Foley MP, at 1.
